item.title: Bike abandoned by user and Forest for at least a week, 28th February
item.description:
Forest is required to GPS track all their bikes as part of the condition of using these bikes within the borough of Lambeth. This bike has been abandoned in an area outside of a designated non-docked bike bay. Forest is clearly not doing what they are required under the conditions of bike use take this bike away and more importantly monitor the abandonment of your bike and every other bike as a service to the public who pay for the pavements that you are using.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Aquinas Street, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip on S side of The Avenue, west of Repton Court, 28th February
item.description:
A small number of tall white kitchen cabinet doors have been dumped on the grass verge on the South side of The Avenue, between Repton Court and Mayfair Close. Please can they be removed - thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A lot of large twigs and small branches, S side of The Avenue between Apex Close and Westgate Road, Beckenham, 28th February
item.description:
Due to the winter gales, a large number of large twigs and a few small branches have landed on the grass verge on the South side of The Avenue, between Apex Close and Westgate Road. Please can they be cleared away.....thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes and crumbling tarmac, 28th February
item.description:
Right along the whole length of Ashfield Lane there are numerous potholes and crumbling tarmac. The drains have sunk. The whole road needs re-surfacing and not just a bodge up job !!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashfield Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 pot holes, 28th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mottingham Road, Mottingham, London

item.title: Motorbike parked on foot way, 28th February

item.title: Laing House Car Park Litter, 28th February
item.description:
Litter including gas canisters and general rubbish strewn in the bushes around Laing House. People use the carpark to drink and socialise and chuck the rubbish in the hedges.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redcar Street, Camberwell, Greater London
